About the Accounting Team


We are a dynamic team of former investment bankers, consultants, and technology finance professionals that enjoy solving the challenges that come with rapid scaling. Our goal is to grow SurveyMonkey as fast, and as profitably, as possible. Our role is to drive and inform some of SurveyMonkey's most important business and financial decisions.

The Role


SurveyMonkey is seeking a Sales Compensation Manager to support our rapidly-growing sales team. As a senior member of the commissions team you will report into the Corporate Controller's organization and partner closely with sales leaders, HR, Finance and Business Intelligence to manage and administer all sales commission plans.

Responsibilities
Participate in the periodic review of compensation plans and provide recommendations regarding redesign to meet business objectives and reinforce operational strategy
Administration of any quota and/or territory changes
Manage and ensures prompt and correct payouts for sales incentive and commission pay
Be responsible for creating reports, dashboards, and presentation packages
Implement controls to ensure completeness and accuracy of sales compensation related data
Assist with the distribution of individual compensation plans and reporting on attainment to target
Identify reporting issues, gaps in processes, and drive timely resolution
Participate in the development and management of sales compensation plans
Ensure all compensation methodologies, policies, procedures and governance are followed
Participate in annual sales compensation planning meetings. Provide guidance on analytics, system constraints and alternatives to achieve goals
Partner cross- functionally in the development of the long-term commission system strategy, to ensure accurate and timely payments (plan implementation), and the development of actionable sales reports,dashboards, and best in class business processes
Work with sales leadership to review and optimize compensation plans as well as be the internal point of contact for commission related questions.
Requirements
BS / BA Degree
You possess min 5+ years direct commissions system management, finance or HR compensation experience with 2-3 years of management experience
Sales commissions experience and knowledge of an incentive system (e.g. Anaplan, Xactly, Varicent, CallidusCloud). Xactly is preferred
Proficient in Microsoft Excel (formulas, pivot tables, charts), PowerPoint, and Word
You have strong quantitative, analytical and organizational skills
You are highly organized, have multi-tasking skills, and efficient in ambiguous situations.
You have excellent documentation, communication, and presentation skills
Experience in a hi-tech sales organization is a plus
At SurveyMonkey, we offer competitive salaries, medical/dental benefits, PTO, 401k, paid holidays and parental leave, and equity compensation.
